Class TrafficGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.carlos.lnsim.lnsim.TrafficGenerator

extends java.lang.Object

      • transactionPayload

        private void transactionPayload(Node to,
                                Node from,
                                Channel currentChannel,
                                int type,
                                DataFetcher l,
                                javax.swing.Timer[] t,
                                int congestion,
                                boolean isRouted)
        Method to send the transaction Payload. It contains sanity check to node balances an channel capacities.
        Parameters:
        to - Receiver node
        from - Sender node
        currentChannel - Current channel used
        type - Transaction recipient type
        l - Data fetcher object entity
        t - Timer to update the GUI
        congestion - Amount of congested channel
        isRouted - Boolean to check the transaction is routed or direct
